text: A deer was chased by hunters and took refuge under a vineyard. The hunters passed by, and the deer, thinking it was well hidden, began to taste the leaves of the vine that covered it. Seeing the leaves move, the hunters very well thought that there was a hidden animal inside, and firing their arrows they mortally wounded the deer. And she saw that she was dying, and said, I have earned it; for I should not have wronged him that saved me. Thank those who help you.
title: La cierva y la viña
author: nan Esopo
